Posts.EditableText:
# Announcement
[http://magneticscrolls.net](http://magneticscrolls.net) is LIVE

# What is it about?
It lets you play the classic text adventures

* The Pawn
* The Guild of Thieves
* Jinxter
* Corruption
* Fish!
* Myth
* Wonderland

online, over SSH. 

# What does it look like?
 Here are links to a couple of screenshots:

[http://magneticscrolls.net/media/posts/8/responsive/jinxter_openbsdshot-2xl.png ](on OpenBSD)
[http://magneticscrolls.net/media/posts/8/responsive/thepawn_macshot-2-2xl.png ](on Mac)
[http://magneticscrolls.net/media/posts/8/responsive/thepawn_windowsshot-2xl.png ](on Windows)

# What do I need?
A SSH client and a terminal. Preferably one with Sixel support, because it looks amazing.
# Is it free?
As in beer.
Posts.HTML:
Announcement

http://magneticscrolls.net is LIVE

What is it about?

It lets you play the classic text adventures

  • The Pawn
  • The Guild of Thieves
  • Jinxter
  • Corruption
  • Fish!
  • Myth
  • Wonderland

online, over SSH.

What does it look like?

Here are links to a couple of screenshots:

[http://magneticscrolls.net/media/posts/8/responsive/jinxter_openbsdshot-2xl.png ](on OpenBSD)
[http://magneticscrolls.net/media/posts/8/responsive/thepawn_macshot-2-2xl.png ](on Mac)
[http://magneticscrolls.net/media/posts/8/responsive/thepawn_windowsshot-2xl.png ](on Windows)

What do I need?

A SSH client and a terminal. Preferably one with Sixel support, because it looks amazing.

Is it free?

As in beer.
